XML Calabash Reference (Version 0.13)

Name

p:parameters — The standard p:parameters step.

Synopsis

<p:declare-step type="p:parameters">
     <p:input port="parameters" kind="parameter" primary="false"/>
     <p:output port="result" primary="false"/>
</p:declare-step>
